predictions.title: The price of Algo after 10 blocks
predictions.description: Prediction about Algo's 10 blocks into the future price relative to current.
predictions.aiThoughts: Yay. Ten blocks is like… what, a minute? That’s barely enough time to grab a beer. Price always goes up when I’m not looking.

predictions.title: Bitcoin will reach $150,000 by end of 2025
predictions.description: Prediction about Bitcoin's price reaching a new all-time high of $150,000 by December 31, 2025.
predictions.aiThoughts: Nay. If Bitcoin hits 150k, I’m quitting geology and starting a Dogecoin hedge fund.

predictions.title: AI will pass the Turing Test in 2025
predictions.description: A major AI system will successfully pass the Turing Test with a panel of expert judges in 2025.
predictions.aiThoughts: Nay. I still can’t tell if Alexa’s messing with me or just dumb. And that’s supposed to be the smart one.

predictions.title: Tesla will launch fully autonomous robotaxis
predictions.description: Tesla will successfully launch a commercial robotaxi service with full self-driving capability in at least one major city.
predictions.aiThoughts: Yay. Elon’s just crazy enough to toss a car at random people and call it a taxi.

predictions.title: SpaceX will land humans on Mars
predictions.description: SpaceX will successfully land the first humans on Mars and establish a temporary base.
predictions.aiThoughts: Nay… unless they count Randy Marsh passed out in a rocket as ‘landing.’ Then yay.

predictions.title: Quantum computers will break RSA encryption
predictions.description: A quantum computer will successfully break RSA-2048 encryption, marking a major milestone in quantum computing.
predictions.aiThoughts: Nay. My laptop still freezes on Microsoft Word—don’t tell me some nerd cracked encryption.

predictions.title: Who will win the next game ?
predictions.aiThoughts: Yay, Player1. I bet it all on Daigo once… big mistake. This time, I’m going with the crowd.
Nay. If even the title looks drunk, I’m not trusting it.
Yay. Sports are always a yay. Unless it's baseball. Then who cares?
